name: Director of Retail Development (Dubai)
description:
Big Smile Coffee is a company that operates in the self-service coffee machine segment. We help people realize themselves in business by selling coffee shops that require no employees and make delicious coffee in one minute. The guarantee of profitability is spelled out in the contract. We are confident in our business and know how to develop further.

We are actively developing our self-service coffee shop chain in Dubai and we need a manager who is responsible for the quality assembly of the coffee points, their efficient operation at the locations, brand awareness among visitors and accordingly coffee sales.

Your tasks include:

  • Supervise the quality production of coffee points by contractors
  • Organize and supervise the installation and connection of coffee points at locations
  • Purchase supplies for maintenance and coffee points
  • Organize and monitor the timely maintenance and replenishment of coffee machines with coffee ingredients
  • Control the data of telemetry, monitor coffee sales indicators at the coffee points
  • Plan and hold promotions and use other marketing techniques to increase coffee cup sales of coffee points
  • In the event the coffee shop is unprofitable, request new locations from the rental department and promptly arrange for the relocation of the coffee shop

You will get:

  • An interesting project and the achievement of goals;
  • Total income that you can influence yourself;
  • A career opportunity and a team with which you can grow;
  • Resources to achieve goals;
  • A company with great charisma.

Our requests:

  • Experience in retail chain development
  • English C1-C2, Arabic (preferably);


Thank you for your attention. We appreciate it. If we have not sent you a feedback within 2
weeks we are not ready to invite you at this moment.
